author: cnbc.com
title: Molina Healthcare Announces First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call Dates
text:
LONG BEACH, Calif., April 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Molina Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE: MOH) today announced details for the release of its results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018.
Molina Healthcare will issue its earnings release for first quarter 2018 before market open on Monday, April 30, 2018, and will host a conference call and webcast to discuss the earnings release that same morning at 8:30 a.m. Eastern time. To access this interactive teleconference, dial (877) 270-2148 and enter the confirmation number, 7249375. A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available through Friday, May 6, 2018, by dialing (877) 344-7529 and entering the confirmation number, 10118429.
A live broadcast of Molina Healthcare’s conference call will be available on the Company’s website, molinahealthcare.com . A 30-day online replay will be available approximately an hour following the conclusion of the live broadcast.
About Molina Healthcare
Molina Healthcare, Inc., a FORTUNE 500 company, provides managed health care services under the Medicaid and Medicare programs and through the state insurance marketplaces. Through its locally operated health plans, Molina Healthcare serves approximately 4.5 million members as of December 31, 2017. For more information about Molina Healthcare, please visit our website at molinahealthcare.com .
Contact: Ryan Kubota Investor Relations (562) 435-3666
Source:Molina Healthcare Inc
